Main Content

Introduction

This document sets out the overall folder structure of the ON drives, as well as general file handling which includes naming conventions and sharing settings. This document is an interim readme prior to the new Design System, which will incorporate these standards.

When saving files on Google Drive, files should always be able to be stored on any of the 3 main Shared Drives – if you’re unsure where to save a file, new folders can always be added. The use of My Drive should be very limited, and ideally avoided.

All our files sit in these 3 main drives:

ON Communications

Comms & marketing, PR and social media

ON Resources

ON brand assets, brand applications, client logos, case studies, document templates and design resources

ON Projects

All active and archived project files (including internal projects)

Communications and Resources drives
